availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born in Campbell County, Shaw married Mary Eveline Reiley on July 1, 1852. He was a farmer in the county and died in Campbell County in 1904.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, “Coleman G. Shaw (December 17, 1818-May 14, 1904),” Memorial #62191019, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=62191019 (accessed June 5, 2017); Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell, not stated, p. 127; Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records ñ Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #unknown, Campbell County Marriages, p. 2.
